metadata.title: CVE-2023-38253 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - low
metadata.description: An out-of-bounds read flaw was found in w3m, in the growbuf_to_Str functionin indep.c. This issue may allow an attacker to cause a denial of servicethrough a crafted HTML file.

criterions.comment: w3m: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
